tactics.name: Keyword Competition Analysis
tactics.description: Use Publisher Rocket to analyze keyword competition, sales, and rankings across Amazon regions
caveats: When keyword search fails to return results
source_quotes: this software will help you to maximize your earnings potential and uncover so many keywords

tactics.name: Keyword Analysis with Publisher Rocket
tactics.description: Use Publisher Rocket to analyze keywords, check competitor data, and export metrics for Amazon book performance.
steps: Type a keyword into the search bar (e.g., 'how to sell on Amazon')
Review related categories and competitor titles
Export data to desktop for detailed analysis
source_quotes: type in a keyword um let's just see how to sell on Amazon and let's leave it at a booms

heuristics.name: Low Review Boost
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are less than 200, prioritize keywords
source_quotes: when I typed in how to make money online in 2023 it did not return any result

heuristics.name: Boost Low-Review Niche Products
heuristics.condition: If median_reviews is below 200, prioritize boosting
source_quotes: this software is really really good and since I purchased this software it has been helping me to even find out things that I do not know about

once you purchase it uh it comes with a 30-day money-back a guarantee

claims.statement: Publisher Rocket helps authors sell on multiple platforms

niche_patterns.description: Target specific audience segments with unique constraints
